full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHING SKYONG CHEN PO GNOD SBYIN KshE TRA P'A LA'I MNGON RTOGS BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL DANG BCAS PA'I RIM PA DRAG PO RDO RJE'I 'BRUG SGRA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
